name: Dark Space (itch) (DadOnArrival85)
description:
The S.S.S Darkspace has gone down mid-flight to its new homeworld, You play as repair bot 8 (B.08) and must traverse the engineering decks in order to restore systems and get the Artificial Intelligence Management Engine (A.I.M.E) back up and running. 

Thanks for checking out my game, I am a complete beginner and this is my first game  developed for the Pixel Game Jam 2022. Please be patient as it seems to take a while to first load, plus some querks which I cant seem to get rid of :)

There is still a lot to do...

  • Sounds
  • Extra Levels
  • Save Functions
  • Actual minigames

.... but I am pleased with how it came out so far, I hope you like playing and don't forget to rate it! Would love to hear your comments and suggestions, this is definitely something I intend to update in future.

Known Bugs:

  • Exiting level can sometimes take you back to text intro with no way out - reload usually resolves
  • Buttons sporadically don't work - reload usually resolves

If in doubt reload lol
